title: 01.Apr.2006.XBMC.XBOX.MediaCenter.1.1.0.GasGiver

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
                          XBMC - XBOX Media Center 1.1.0
                        Release Date...........01.Apr.2006
                        Release Size................4x15MB
                        Release Language.....Multilanguage
                        Operating System...........M$-XBOX

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   INFORMATION:

   This package is my little "contribution" to the scene.
   Hope you like it ... !! Comments & Suggestions are always welcome !!
   Releases will be made available on a weekly basis, unless a serious bug
   is found, or something else important happens that justifies an Update.

   ALWAYS REMEMBER:

   This is software in development - You should regard yourself as a BetaTester!
   Please read the complete Changelogs to keep yourself informed.
   Some features might still be in their initial development stages ...
   You can find some Troubleshooting Tips further down this document.
   Please read this .nfo - it has some useful information, really ;-)
   Keep a tried and trusted XBMC Version handy, incase you need to go back !

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   SKINS INCLUDED:

   Original Project Mayhem III Skin from CVS only.
   It guarantees everything works perfectly and keeps Releases Small & Clean.
   This skin is constantly changed and updated. I you want to use other skins,
   make sure they are suitable for this particular CVS Version of XBMC.
   DonÃ‚Â´t ask me about problems with 3rd Party Skins - YouÃ‚Â´re on your own here !

   Added Weather Display to Home Screen (visible only with Internet connection)
   It displays the currently selected city from the Weather menu.   

   You can get more Skins here:
  <a href=" http://www.xbox-skins.net/forums/index.php?dlcategory=7" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.xbox-skins.net/forums/index.php?dlcategory=7</a>
  <a href=" http://www.allxboxskins.com/skins/index.php?app=XBMC&cat=0" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.allxboxskins.com/skins/index.php?app=XBMC&cat=0</a>

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   SCRIPTS INCLUDED:

   FlexiBrowser / GameSaves / GameSpotPlus / GameTrailers
   QuickTimeBrowser (Movie Trailers) / Stupid Videos V2 / SubmenuEditor 
   WebRadio (SimpleKML V2) / XBMCLyrics / XBMCScripts

   All Scripts appear in the Scripts Submenu.
   You can change the Submenu appearance with the SubmenuEditor yourself. 

   Get more Scripts via the XBMCScripts menu or @ http://www.xbmcscripts.com  

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   VISUALISATION ADDONS INCLUDED (All Zipped):

   G-Force:  1507 total (including the CVS supplied ones)
   MilkDrop MegaPack: 7977 total (including the CVS supplied ones)
   MilkDrop: BritneysPAIRS 110 favorite MilkDrop Presets
              
   I slightly modified some settings in /visualisations/milkdrop.xml
   The original file from CVS has been renamed to milkdrop.xml.CVS
   The MilkDrop MegaPack is the default MilkDrop Preset Pack.

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   ABOUT TRAINERS:

   There are 540 Trainers included to give you a good start.
   I collected these from the net (including Mikerowesoft Packs 1-3) and deleted
   all (binary) dupes. I absolutely donÃ‚Â´t know which ones work and which donÃ‚Â´t ! 
   PLEASE do not ask me anything about the included Trainers.

   Trainer files need to be in /system/Trainers - Use the context menu on a Game
   listed in MY PROGRAMS to refresh the Trainer List or to change Trainer options. 

   Get Trainers e.g. @ http://trainers.maxconsole.net (Free Registration required)

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   RELEASE NOTES:

   Added Stupid Videos V2 - Thanks to "momad" for this nice script !   

   Removed Project Mayhem III Style Webserver Interface from KanadaKid (Scott)
   - seems that there is some development going on with the CVS included one ...
  
         !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
         ! Please help the developers by posting bugs on sourceforge.net !
         !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   CHANGELOG:

   To keep this .nfo shorter, I only list the topmost 3 lines here, so you can
   see whatÃ‚Â´s included here. Always read the official XBMC Changelog at  
  <a href=" http://cvs.sourceforge.net/viewcvs.py/xbmc/XBMC/Changelog.txt?view=markup" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://cvs.sourceforge.net/viewcvs.py/xbmc/XBMC/Changelog.txt?view=markup</a>
   You can also find it in /docs/Changelog.txt

   30-03-2006 fixed: Current playlist source wasn&#039;t reset, and internet streams
                     would always try and use it to lookup thumbs.
   29-03-2006 fixed: If an image failed to load, you couldn&#039;t move to the next
                     image (while viewing pictures from My Pictures).
   29-03-2006 fixed: Fading on RSS controls wasn&#039;t working.

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   TROUBLESHOOTING TIPS:

   If you are experiencing all kinda weird problems using an updated version
   of XBMC it is always a good idea to delete the XBMCÃ‚Â´s "SaveGame"
   using the Micro$oft Dashboard.
   Alternatively, just delete the E:/TDATA/0face008 and E:/UDATA/0face008 dirs.
   This is especially important if you are updating from quite an old version.

   To avoid problems you should also check - with every new release - 
   if the included XboxMediaCenter.xml has been changed significantly.
   You should then update your own customized XboxMediaCenter.xml accordingly.

   If using XBMC as Dashboard, donÃ‚Â´t forget to update the files on DRIVE -C-.

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   THANKS:

   All the XBMC developers !!
   Your program makes the XBOX worth soOo much more for all of us !
   Everyone contributing to the scene !

.:...............................................................................:.
 ^                                                                               ^
   PS:

   Enjoy & Please Seeeeed !

.:...............................................................................:.
 :                                                                               :
 : For Budget Reasons, the Light at the End of the Tunnel had to be switched Off :
 :                                                                               :
